settings.heading: Shipping Information
settings.content:
Order Processing:

Orders are processed within 1‚Äì3 business days. A tracking number will be provided via email once your order has been shipped.

Shipping Locations:

We ship worldwide! No matter where you are, we‚Äôll deliver to your doorstep. Shipping times may vary depending on your country.

Free Shipping:

Enjoy free shipping on all orders with 2 or more items, anywhere in the world ‚Äî no minimum spend required.

Delays:

Please note that shipping times may be delayed during holidays or due to unforeseen circumstances. We recommend placing orders early to ensure timely delivery.

Package Tracking:

Once your order is dispatched, you‚Äôll receive a tracking number to monitor your package on the carrier‚Äôs website or directly through our store.

settings.heading: Return Policy
settings.content:
We are committed to ensuring your satisfaction with every purchase. Our 30-day return policy allows you to request a return within 30 days of receiving your item.

1. Am I Eligible for a Return?

Your item must meet the following conditions:

  • Condition: Unworn, unused, with tags, and in its original packaging.
  • Proof of Purchase: Receipt or order confirmation must be provided.

2. How to Start a Return

Follow these simple steps to begin your return:

  • Contact Us: Email support_agent@caseease.com with your order details and reason for return.
  • Approval: Once your return is accepted, we‚Äôll send you a return shipping label and instructions.
  • Send It Back: Ship your package to: 2504 E Market Street, Greensboro, NC 27401.
    Note: Items sent back without prior approval will not be accepted.

3. What About Damaged or Incorrect Items?

Inspect your order upon receipt and contact us immediately at support_agent@caseease.com if:

  • Your item is defective or damaged.
  • You received the wrong item.
    We‚Äôll evaluate the issue and take appropriate action to resolve it.

4. Can I Exchange an Item?

Yes! The fastest way to get the item you want is to return your current one. Once your return is accepted, place a new order for the desired item.

5. When Will I Get My Refund?

Once your return is received and inspected, we will notify you of the refund status:

  • Approved Refunds: Processed to your original payment method within 10 business days.
  • Bank Processing Time: It may take additional time for your bank or credit card company to post the refund.
    Haven‚Äôt received your refund? If more than 15 business days have passed since approval, contact us at support_agent@caseease.com.

6. Who Covers Return Shipping Costs?

  • Our Responsibility: We cover shipping for defective, damaged, or incorrect items.
  • Your Responsibility: For all other returns (e.g., change of mind), you‚Äôll cover the return shipping costs.

7. Need Help?

For any questions about returns or refunds, contact us at support_agent@caseease.com. We‚Äôre here to help and ensure a smooth process for you.
